title: BrainStuff Classics: How Can a Black Hole Help Prove General Relativity?
itunes:title: BrainStuff Classics: How Can a Black Hole Help Prove General Relativity?
description:
Astronomers detected hints of Einstein's theory of general relativity in the Milky Way's supermassive black hole. Learn more in this classic episode of BrainStuff.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
